external_games.name: Witches' Legacy: Slumbering Darkness Collector's Edition

name: Witches' Legacy: Slumbering Darkness - Collector's Edition
summary: The legacy of the witches continues when good witch Lynn and her witch hunter husband are lured into a trap set by a mysterious sorcerer. Uncover his evil plans and save your family! You'll be joined by an impish sidekick who can do what you can't, when he's got the right stuff… This is a meaty game with loads of puzzles and hidden-objects scenes to keep you satisfied.
